author: senh
title: The Pont des Arts bridge in Paris has been freed from 45 tons of padlocks
text: BING NEWS: The Pont des Arts bridge in Paris has been freed from 45 tons of padlocks PARIS — In June, city officials removed approximately 45 tons of love locks from the Pont des Arts pedestrian bridge, ground zero for couples smitten with the idea of symbolically locking up their love and throwing away the key.
